word: H2914 - טְחֹר - ṭᵉchôr - tekh-ore' - Emerod - மூலநோய்

sections.paragraph: Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to burn; a boil or ulcer (from the inflammation), especially a tumor in the anus or pudenda (the piles): - emerod.
